reason: The text describes a recent overdose event, a life-threatening situation requiring naloxone intervention.

title: User Story: Overdose
content: Saw a guy OD downtown yesterday. Scary. Narcan saved him, but it shook me up. Please, if you're struggling, reach out. There's help. Don't become a statistic.
reason: Witnessing an overdose suggests a risk of further overdose incidents in the area, and while the person survived, it indicates a serious underlying problem. The message is encouraging seeking help which indicates concern.
